website_summaries.verdict: The Colorado has been a classic work boot for women.  Its stylish look and rigid construction make it the ideal boot for any occasion.
pros: Full grain leather on a soft toe boot

customer_reviews.title: You won't believe it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use while my other pair of Cat boots were being reconditioned after seven trouble few years. These new Cat boots are so comfortable! Perfect fit. Can't possibly be any better. Now these new boots are my regulars, ad the older ones are my backup boots. Highly recommend these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zero

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BOOTS!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. I'm wearing them now. I was nervous about the suede but they look the same today and as when I took them out of the box. Very, very comfortable. I had become accustomed to just ordering men's shoes to get the sturdiness that is often not available in women's shoes. These are awesome and I would buy these again in a minute.
customer_reviews.author: pamela4949

customer_reviews.title: Fashionista painter
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for myself for Mother’s Day. I loved them so much and got a lot of positive comments at work. It’s now August and the fur has peeled off the toes and edges. They still look cute but the wear and tear is going to happen on a construction site. I loved in the beginning any paint splash or residue easily brushed out of the fur. My daughter wanted a pair as well.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: I bought caterpillar because I thought they were a good, sturdy brand
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my daughter who's at a technical high school to wear every other week at her shop class. I bought caterpillar because I thought they were a good, sturdy brand. I was wrong. They developed two holes for no apparent reason and when I contacted the seller about it I never heard back. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HarrietteS

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice boots. I bought them for gardening
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice boots. I bought them for gardening, and, so far no problems: ie blisters. As with most shoes/ boots, the insoles provided are pretty meh so I switched them out for Super Feet, and presto, great arch support.
customer_reviews.author: skippyjr

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable and different
customer_reviews.text: These are much nicer than I expected. I simply bought these in the Colorado because of the brand and they were cheap. They are very comfortable and different. Never thought I’d like an animal print like this!! 🤣 the fit was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Paz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! They're very cool looking and the texture actually feels like dog fur. I can wear them all day and basically forget I have them on. We got them at an excellent price too! Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: I loved them I did order 1/2a size larger as with boots I like to wear a thicker sock but the was too big so I returned them and ordered my regular size of 7 1/2 and they're prefect. Seemed well made, sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: K Downs

customer_reviews.title: YES!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are as cute and they are comfy! I always add a little arch support because well I’m 63 and I need it! I wore them this past weekend helping my husband move bales of hay and they were a perfect protection and looked cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. I had read reviews that suggested they run large, so I ordered 1/2 size smaller that normal and the fit is perfect. Nicely made, stylish, comfortable, and a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: DINK DENNING

customer_reviews.title: I am so in love with these boots
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with these boots! I originally ordered size 8 but were larger than your average 8 so exchanged for 7.5 and they are perfect. I will be wearing these all the time :)
customer_reviews.author: Karen Bencivenga

customer_reviews.title: Walking on a cement floor all day is tough on ...
customer_reviews.text: Walking on a cement floor all day is tough on the feet. With these shoes, not problem at all. Rather than paying 30 bucks for some tennis shoes every 3 months, a pair of these will last much, much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Yu

customer_reviews.title: These fit him great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who’s feet are too narrow for men’s. These fit him great!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: They look and feel great, I have read the comments and ordered 1 ...
customer_reviews.text: They look and feel great, I have read the comments and ordered 1 size smaller. Usually i wear 7 but in this case I ordered 6 and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: crf50015

customer_reviews.title: Great boots for looking sexy on a job site
customer_reviews.text: Wife has to take photos on construction sites, bought these as a gift. She LOVES them
customer_reviews.author: BenZoh

customer_reviews.title: Careful with the sizing
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Fits well once you understand their sizes and timberlands are a size different. TIMBERLANDS I took 8.5 caterpillar I took 7.5 I thought I was a 7.5
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, comfy, but run large
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these boots. They're warm, the grip is awesome, they're not too heavy. But beware, they run big - I would say probably a full size. So I wish I had ordered an 8, but got the 9 and waited too long to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennnnnny

customer_reviews.title: Tomboy chic
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size smaller than normal due to reviews and they were spot on. These fit perfectly. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: A little narrow for me
customer_reviews.text: I did my best to find best fit with measurement chart, but they were still too narrow. I wore them a few times trying to work them in, then gave up. I wish I had returned them earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: somewhere are dirty seems that it's not a new one
customer_reviews.text: it's cute. A little small, but can bear it. somewhere are dirty seems that it's not a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Issonia Yelling

customer_reviews.title: Good value and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Wearing these for working in yard and tree trimming. Great protection for feet! Use socks not too thick or seemed to rub a bit. Worth the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Madisnani

customer_reviews.title: ) great fit, just had some dust when it came
customer_reviews.text: Came way earlier than planned:) great fit, just had some dust when it came.. Overall great service and product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great boots and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for walking around campus. Theyre somewhat stiff at the beginning and gave me a small bruise on my ankle. Make sure to wear with thick socks the first couple of times. These are great boots and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ileana Vargas

customer_reviews.title: I like the fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit. They are boots for my farm. They are really ugly, would never where them on the street. Good thing I didn’t buy them for that! But for farm work they are great!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Lydick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. The size runs large. I usually wear US 7 or 7.5, but this one I ordered 6.5. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ding

customer_reviews.title: other than that I absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.text: Runs large in size, other than that I absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: KELI LEMA

customer_reviews.title: No break in time needed, I could wear them ...
customer_reviews.text: No break in time needed, I could wear them all day the first time I put them on, but I did still need to put my arch supports in them.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love how comfortable these are. But I disliked how they rubbed on the back of my calf until they were broke in.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much more comfortable than timberland or dr.martens! I absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Yobbie

customer_reviews.title: Wear them all day!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, they are comfortable for all day, if you are size 36 you should get a a 35 or 35.5.they are cute and the best quality I ever had in boots.
customer_reviews.author: MIA

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing boots! So comfortable and look amazing for an urban look.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Pando

customer_reviews.title: Even too roomy for the Old Woman that lived in a shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Felt like I was wearing the box that the boots came in. Too wide, that the boot laces couldn't even tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Review Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: and seems like they run smaller than they used to
customer_reviews.text: Ordered same size as the last pair I bought, and seems like they run smaller than they used to. Great brand and style for working long shifts, but disappointed that they didn't fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Erinn

customer_reviews.title: Great for Grit, Bad for Slick Everyday Floors
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely stiff when you get them. I think its going to take a good while of constant wear to break them in. Theres no cushion at all on the soles and not a lot of bend at all. So though I like these bulky shoes, they aren't too comfortable. There's not a lot of grip on the bottoms either so these are legit dangerous on slick floors. That being said they would be good gripping in dirt and awesome stepping on unsteady grounds.
customer_reviews.author: RayChu

customer_reviews.title: A little large in size but excellent work boots
customer_reviews.text: I saved almost $60 dollars on these boots. A little large in size but excellent work boots.
customer_reviews.author: holly

customer_reviews.title: A very well-made and stylish boot!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife. They look really nice. However, they're about a 1/2 too large. Still a great and good looking shoe!
customer_reviews.author: David R

customer_reviews.title: ... norm thanks to previous reviews and the fit is perfect. Great boot for the money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size smaller than my norm thanks to previous reviews and the fit is perfect. Great boot for the money.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute shoes that are really warm. I get complimented on them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: this is a cool boots
customer_reviews.text: i can wear anything with it,jeans,hot shorts,it makes my legs seem longer,l love it,and i love black.
customer_reviews.author: Jijia Li

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots ! Fit amazing and love the color!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the usual size i wear and they fit good to me
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it just size is little larger but no problem I got one size smaller its so beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, fashionable work boots designed for women! I chose the black ones with the silver smudging on the toes and they look both tough and stylish. As far as functionality goes they are fairly comfortable as far as boots go although I'd recommend an insole. They're pretty light weight and the leather is soft and fairly flexible, they move with your feet. I'm a manager who works in a variety of conditions and my feet felt fine after working a 10 hour shift plus unloading a truck. The only downside I can find is that they scuff easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Geiger

customer_reviews.title: Great boots.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this boots for my girlfriend, we were kind of unsure about sizing since reviews are mixed saying they fit small and big. We went half size down from normal shoe size. She is a 6 and we ordered a 5.5 and they fit perfectly! Quality seems great too, they are sturdy and solid. The color is accurate too, we got the honey brown. If you are looking for some stylish but very durable high quality boots for construction or field work stop looking and go ahead on buying these. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cute boot
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 20 year old daughter. They do run big so i purchase a 1/2 size smaller. She wears them with thick socks so they fit nicely. Also they look super cute on her feet.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: I also hated how "CATERPILLAR" was splashed in huge letters on the ...
customer_reviews.text: The gold is way gaudier than I thought it would be. I also hated how "CATERPILLAR" was splashed in huge letters on the side of the band around the ankle. I returned these.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: I really like the look and the overall fit was good
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and the overall fit was good. I bit larger for a six. I just wear thicker socks to fill the gap. Very happy with these boots. Nice looking boot.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisD

customer_reviews.title: Bad Ass Boot
customer_reviews.text: I had caterpillar boots before and they lasted me a good 20 years. Probably 20 years old when I bought them and finally pitched them around 40 years of age. By far, the best, baddest boot I'd ever had. So, turning 50 years old this year, I decided it was high time I indulged in another pair. Love the silver. They look awesome with my black Silverado truck!!!! Won't buy a different pair of boots again! Well, maybe when I'm 70!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter saw these and had to have them. She loves the fit and the style of them. She says they are very comfortable. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Reiter
